sentences.en: Around 180,000 metric tons of food aid is required.
sentences.cn: 大约需要十八万公吨的食品援助。

sentences.en: Converting metric measurements to U.S. equivalents is easy.
sentences.cn: 将公制计量单位换算为美制计量单位十分简单。

sentences.en: How many imperial inches are there in one metric centimetre? — Naught point three nine three seven inches.
sentences.cn: 一厘米等于多少英寸? ——等于0.397英寸.

sentences.en: In the metric system, measurements are made in metres and liters.
sentences.cn: 在公制中, 用米和升作计量单位.

sentences.en: Most characters of economic value to plant and animal breeders are metric characters.
sentences.cn: 对植物和动物育种家具有经济价值的大多数性状是一些度量性状.

sentences.en: Please make us a cable offer for 5 metric tons of walnut.
sentences.cn: 请电报5吨核桃仁的价格.

sentences.en: The metric system is fit to all of the world.
The parts all come in metric sizes now.
sentences.cn: 现在配件都采用公制规格。

sentences.en: The petrol pumps have gone metric, ie measure petrol in litres.
sentences.cn: 汽油加油泵已采用公制了.

sentences.en: The rate of loading should be 300 metric tons per workable hatch.
sentences.cn: 每个可使用的舱口的装货率应为300公吨.

sentences.en: The Wall Street Journal uses 220,000 metric tons of newsprint each year.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》每年用去22万公吨新闻纸。

sentences.en: These screws are metric , ie have been measured in fractions of a metre.
We are gradually changing over to a completely metric system.
sentences.cn: 我们正逐渐过渡到完全使用公制。

sentences.en: We have amended the quantity as 200 metric tons.
sentences.cn: 我们已将数量改为二百公吨.

words.tran_cn: 测量的；韵律的；有韵律的

trans.tran_cn: 米制的，公制的，十进制的，度量的，距离的
trans.tran_en: using or connected with the  metric system  of weights and measures
